appetizers.name: Egg fried rice
appetizers.description: A flavorful dish which borders on being an appetizer

appetizers.name: Potstickers
ingredients: 6 scallions, the white and green parts separated, both minced
4 tablespoons peanut oil or vegetable oil
¼ cup rice vinegar or white vinegar
¾ pound ground pork or other meat
1 egg, lightly beaten in a bowl
appetizers.description: A small Asian dumpling that is stuffed with a variety of ingredients such as meats or fish, vegetables and seasoning.
